GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v5.4.227
GSD.description:
mac802154: fix missing INIT_LIST_HEAD in ieee802154_if_add()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.227 by commit 1831d4540406708e48239cf38fd9c3b7ea98e08f, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit fcf39e6e88e9492f6688ec8ba4e1be622b904232. For more details please see the references link.
